bibl.title: Ray Raymond v. Territory of Washington. Affidavit
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss In the district court of the 4th judicial Dist. Holding terms at County seat of Spokane County.
Territory of Washington v. Ray Raymond Defendant

Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss I Thomas C. Griffiths, being first duly sworn in my oath say:I just prepared the accompanying draftof affidavit for Wm. Bigham in his presence and according to the facts as stated to me by hi and was the affidavit or draft of affidavit. This and he informed me that the statemints therein were true in fact and that he named make the affidavit is the prosecuting attorney said he lined and with the said draft of affidavit and whereas is to affidavit in heney declined making the affidavit by advice that appoint behind the advice referred to is the advice of the prosecuting attorney and that but for such advice the affidavit names have been true made affiant further states that he is informed and believs that the matters and things set forth in said
affidavit which is fourth annexed and made part hereof marked "a" actions and within the knowledge of the prosecuting attorney.
Subscribed to & sworn to before me this 24th day of May, 1887
N.T. Catin Notary Public Wash. Ter.
